comments.comment:
arabannata satana lakdiwa satara kone
dalada utum wenda awasara labaagene
deviyan nata matu budu wana suwamine
denumena pihita sun kerumata tibena hene
is satan kamin le vilak kara
katuwa pitiye palliya sunu visunu kara
visi ek wenida mulu lokema niruttara
karamin pennuwe is balaye sera
 me wage avi aran matuda ratata ape
 karana vinasaya penna deepu ape
nenasara samuduge atapaya kadala ape
leawe sipirige maha un tikai ape

hada kakiyamin penna dun etta edaa
ehewwe ne ekek mu pissekui dodaa
awaman kotek kara samiduta gahapu edaa
ungen ahanawa  den satutuida ?
medaa
comments.author: Sarati Lanka

replies.replyComment:
uguduo vilasa eti keseluth kaala  ada
inne niruttara uttara netuwa ada
himiyan kiwa de ettai neda? ada
yanuwen sitana molayak ne munta ada

bala tanhawa mata math wee hitiya eun 
triliyana ganan maha bankuwe gahapu eun
is antawadeen goda neguwa eun
waga kiwa yutui miyagiya sema denata moun

comments.comment:
Some people may say negative things about this monk, but I think he‚Äôs just as angry and frustrated as any Sinhalese person would be about the current incompetent, ineffective, inefficient and impotent UNP/Yahapalana Government that is only interested in robbing banks and fattening themselves at the expense of the nation and its people and not done ANYTHING for the last four plus years in power! 

Everything Rev Gnanasara said and fought for then, has now come true - and all that this stupid government did was imprison him without taking necessary action to protect the people and the country!
comments.author: Dev De Silva
